item.title: Vim Workflow
item.description: Max Shen share his Vim motion workflow and provide some examples when using Vim. You can learn when to use which Vim command in this tutorial.

item.title: Vim Basics
item.description: Learn about the basics and practical comands in Vim. This tutorial covers normal mode, command-line mode and insert mode in Vim.
